description.value:
Special: Primitive (8), Unwieldy

Note: Strapped to user's wrist by a tough hide loop. As a Half Action Can be wrapped around the wrist and swung around causing an unnerving waling sound that gives wielder Fear(+1), if doing this and then attacking, add 2x Strength Bonus to damage and impose -10 to Parry Attack.
